trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for common formatting-option properties to be applied to field template user controls.
trans-unit.target: 为通用格式设置选项属性定义一个接口，这些属性要应用于字段模板用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the formatting string that is specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString" /> property is applied to field values when the field is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当字段处于编辑模式时，是否将 <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString" /> 属性指定的格式设置字符串应用于字段值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the formatting string is applied in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在编辑模式下应用格式设置字符串，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to <see langword="null" /> values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串为字段的值指定显示格式。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 指定字段值的显示格式的格式化字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件的数据在呈现之前是否经过 HTML 编码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的数据在呈现之前经过 HTML 编码，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding field values helps prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: HTML 编码的字段值有助于防止跨站点脚本攻击和从浏览器中呈现的恶意内容。

trans-unit.source: This property should be enabled unless you trust the content or have checked for malicious content in another way.
trans-unit.target: 应启用此属性，除非您信任内容或签入了另一种方法之后包含恶意内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当字段值为 <see langword="null" /> 时为该字段显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: The caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当字段值为 <see langword="null" /> 时为该字段显示的标题。
